(There will be mass delays for any posting today from me, for two reasons.  
My brother has a friend over and they plan on the computers a lot, and I'm 
playing Smackdown! 2 quite a bit on the ol' playstation)

Vehement/Shockwave/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Unicron/The Protectobots:




Vehement was lying on the ground, but kept his blood red optics looking at 
the sun as the solar technology in them absorbed great amounts of energy, his 
overall power level back up to 65% again.  

He stood, firing off a wide blast of optic energy, intercepting three charges 
heading for Sun Crusher.  Twenty five blasts struck Vehement's armor, not 
penetrating it or even coming close to it.

The ginormous robot stretched an arm with a sick smile.  His left arm 
transformed into a wide cannon as a eight foot long broadsword appeared in 
his right hand.

Raising the cannon of an arm, he launching two energy-signature seeking 
missiles at Iron Raptor's abdomen.

Moving the point of the broadsword to point at Condor, a fire ball errupting 
from it at the enemy's chest.

---

Reflector felt a surge of power, that told him Unicron was siphoning more 
power to him.  Getting up and ignoring the pain as twenty-three shots dug 
into his body, he raised an arm, launching two missile at IRIS from his wrist 
cannon.

---

Sun Crusher rolled to the left, the explosions from the charge sending him 
flipping through the air, slamming painfully to his legs, almost causing him 
to crash to the ground.  "That's it, heathens," he said, spitting mech-fluid 
into the burnt grass before him, "you want to die painfully, be my guest."

With that, his shaped twisted into the form of a tank, Sun Crusher the hover 
tank bringing a long barrel to point at the CF, launching three explosive 
shells from the bowels of the tank.

---

Unicron, still disguised as Unitron, activated a comm. link to all Alliance 
members at the scene of the Cybertronian Fire.  

"All Alliance warriors, this is Unitron," his voice sounding exactly like 
Unitron's, his appearance the same as well, "I received orders from Zardus, 
leave everyone alone and focus solely on crippling the Cybertronian Fire 
beyond repair.  Then make a full retreat."

===

Shockwave was flying at his top speed for atmospheric conditions in his space 
fighter mode, arming all his weapons.  The cause would not fall.

===

Hot Spot looked at two CR chambers, noticing First Aid and Blades were still 
badly damaged.  He then looked over to Groove and Streetwise.

"Blades is closer to being repaired.  I will stay here and have him go out to 
help you while you attack the enemies outside.

Groove and Streetwise nodded, runinng as fast as they could for their nearest 
exit out of the ship that wasn't a large hole in the ship.
